message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. Given its value to you, I believe we can come to an agreement that benefits both parties. My initial offer for the product is $1200000.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900000. The product is valuable to me, but I'd like to negotiate further to find a mutually beneficial price.
Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your perspective on the value of the product. My counteroffer for the product is $1050000.
I appreciate your counteroffer, but I'm still a bit above my target price. Would you be willing to consider $950000? I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to stay within my budget.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Bob. Considering the value of the product to you, I would like to propose a price of $1000000 for the product.
I'm getting close to my target, but I still need to make some adjustments. Would you be willing to consider $900000? I'm willing to make a final push to get to an agreement.
I understand your position, Bob. After careful consideration, I am willing to accept $950000 for the product.
